Welcome to Rainaissance 2.0. Here you find snow! Snow on your mac is a delightful thing and truly prepares you for the cozy holidays. Watch the snow drift lazily down your screen or set it to be a full on blizzard. It's fun.ğŸŒ¨ï¸

Not only do we have snow, but you can also turn on rain sounds. This was introduced earlier, but has been improved to properly sync with the server where the sounds are pulled from.
